Entries.default: You come upon a weathered skiff. Paint-peeling, it rocks languidly in the water.
Tethered on a sun-bleached line, the weathered skiff bumps against the dock when its rocked forward on a wave.
Silent as a becalmed sea, you row through the narrow cavern into Neketaka's bay, making your way to Queen's Berth.
With brisk and powerful strokes, you navigate through Neketaka's bay and a sheltered sea cavern until you come upon the Undercroft.
